title: Multi-Line Editor
description: Generate multiple lines based on templates with dynamic placeholders.
intro: Fill in the fields and watch the output being generated automatically.
hint.separator: Separate multiple blocks with '---' (one per line group).
help.intro: You can use the following placeholders in your template:
help.input: Text entered in the base text field
help.i: Incremental number with optional zero padding
help.separator: Use three hyphens (---) to split multiple template blocks.
